comment_0: Roller Coaster" is a song written by Michael Carter and Cole Swindell, and recorded by American country music singer Luke Bryan. It was released to country radio on July 14, 2014 as the fifth single from his fourth studio album, Crash My Party. Starring male role of the video is professional surfer Evan Geiselman. Leading female role is Madison DeCamillis of New Smyrna Beach, FL.
